The white warhammer is a warhammer that requires completion of the Wanted! quest and a Strength level of 10 to wield. Players can purchase this weapon from Sir Vyvin in Falador after obtaining the rank of Master (1,300 Black Knight kills).

As with all black and white equipment, the White warhammer cannot be made from raw materials using the Smithing skill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)
  • White warhammers now require level 10 Strength to wield instead of level 10 Attack.
  • The white warhammer's strength bonus was increased from 19 to 22.

[[File:White warhammer detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''white warhammer''' is a [[warhammer]] that requires completion of the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]] and a [[Strength]] level of 10 to wield. Players can purchase this weapon from [[Sir Vyvin]] in [[Falador]] after obtaining the [[White Knight rank|rank]] of Master (1,300 [[Black Knight]] kills).

As with all [[Black equipment|black]] and [[white equipment]], the White warhammer cannot be made from raw materials using the [[Smithing]] skill.
